trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> column that hosts textual content in its cells.
Use DataGridTextColumn to display columns of data as text.
The following illustration shows an example of two DataGridTextColumn types.
![Two DataGridTextColumns](~/add/media/wpf-datagridtextcolumns.png "Two DataGridTextColumns") To create a column, add it to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection.
To populate the column, bind the column to the data by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding%2A> property.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding%2A> property is applied to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> element created in the column.
The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> for the element in each cell is the data item for the row the cell is in.
Therefore, to set up the binding you only have to set the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
Optionally, you can specify a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> if you want to convert the data or the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.StringFormat%2A>.
For more information about data binding, see [Data Binding (WPF)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
**Note** DataGridTextColumn creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> element in the non-editing mode and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> element in the editing mode.

You can customize the DataGridTextColumn by setting properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn.FontSize%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsReadOnly%2A>.

If you want to display other types of data, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> provides the following column types: |Column Type|Data Display| |-----------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHyperlinkColumn>|Use to display URI data.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn>|Use to display enumeration data.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn>|Use to display Boolean data.| If you want to use other controls in your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>, you can create your own column types by using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn"></xref> class.
Causes the column cell being edited to revert to the specified value.
The element that the column displays for a cell in editing mode.
The previous, unedited value in the cell being edited.
Performs any required validation before exiting the edit mode.
The element that the column displays for a cell in editing mode.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if validation fails; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
The default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.EditingElementStyle*> property.
An object that represents the style.
The default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.ElementStyle*> property.
An object that represents the style.
Gets or sets the font family for the content of cells in the column.
The FontFamily property determines the font for controls in the column only when the template uses the property as a parameter.
The font family of the content for cells in the column.
The registered default is <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontFamily*>.
For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn.FontFamily*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the font size for the content of cells in the column.
The FontSize property determines the font size for controls in the column only when the template uses the property as a parameter.
The font size of the content of cells in the column.
The registered default is <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontSize*>.
For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn.FontSize*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the font style for the content of cells in the column.
The FontStyle property determines the font style for controls in the column only when the template uses the property as a parameter.
The font style of the content of cells in the column.
The registered default is <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontStyle*>.
For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn.FontStyle*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the font weight for the content of cells in the column.
The FontWeight property determines the font weight for controls in the column only when the template uses the property as a parameter.
The font weight of the contents of cells in the column.
The registered default is <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontWeight*>.
For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn.FontWeight*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> that is used to paint the text contents of cells in the column.
The Foreground property determines the brush for the text contents of controls in the column only when the template uses the property as a parameter.
The brush that is used to paint the contents of cells in the column.
The registered default is <xref:System.Windows.SystemColors.ControlTextBrush*>.
For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn.Foreground*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref> control that is bound to the column's <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*> property value.
The cell that will contain the generated element.
The data item represented by the row that contains the intended cell.
A new text box control that is bound to the column's <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*> property value.
Gets a read-only <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock"></xref> control that is bound to the column's <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*> property value.
The cell that will contain the generated element.
The data item represented by the row that contains the intended cell.
A new, read-only text block control that is bound to the column's <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*> property value.
Called when a cell in the column enters editing mode.
The element that the column displays for a cell in editing mode.
Information about the user gesture that is causing a cell to enter editing mode.
The unedited value of the cell.
Refreshes the contents of a cell in the column in response to a column property value change.
The cell to update.
The name of the column property that has changed.
